verses.verse: Now <S%H1413>gather<s%> yourself in <S%H1416>troops<s%>, O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H1416>troops<s%>: he has <S%H7760>laid<s%> <S%H4692>siege<s%> against <S%H5221>us<s%>: they shall strike the <S%H8199>judge<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with a <S%H7626>rod<s%> upon the <S%H3895>cheek<s%>.

But <S%H1035>you<s%>, Bethâ€“lehem <S%H672>Ephratah<s%>, though you be <S%H6810>little<s%> among the <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, yet out of you shall he come <S%H3318>forth<s%> unto me that is to be <S%H4910>ruler<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; whose goings <S%H4163>forth<s%> have been from of <S%H6924>old<s%>, from <S%H3117>everlasting<s%>.

Therefore will he give them <S%H5414>up<s%>, until the <S%H6256>time<s%> that she which <S%H3205>travails<s%> has brought <S%H3205>forth<s%>: then the <S%H3499>remnant<s%> of his <S%H251>brothers<s%> shall <S%H7725>return<s%> unto the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And he shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> and <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> in the <S%H5797>strength<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, in the <S%H1347>majesty<s%> of the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> his <S%H430>God<s%>; and they shall <S%H3427>stay<s%>: for now shall he be <S%H1431>great<s%> unto the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

And this man shall be the <S%H7965>peace<s%>, when the <S%H804>Assyrian<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> into our <S%H776>land<s%>: and when he shall <S%H1869>tread<s%> in our <S%H759>palaces<s%>, then shall we <S%H6965>raise<s%> against him <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7462>shepherds<s%>, and <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H5257>principal<s%> <S%H120>men<s%>.

And they shall <S%H7462>waste<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5248>Nimrod<s%> in the <S%H6607>entrances<s%> <S%H5337>there<s%>: thus shall he deliver us from the <S%H804>Assyrian<s%>, when he <S%H935>comes<s%> into our <S%H776>land<s%>, and when he <S%H1869>treads<s%> inside our <S%H1366>borders<s%>.

And the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> shall be in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> as a <S%H2919>dew<s%> from the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, as the <S%H7241>showers<s%> upon the <S%H6212>grass<s%>, that <S%H6960>waits<s%> not for <S%H376>man<s%>, nor <S%H3176>waits<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>.

And the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> shall be among the <S%H1471>Nations<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> as a <S%H738>lion<s%> among the <S%H929>animals<s%> of the <S%H3293>forest<s%>, as a young <S%H3715>lion<s%> among the <S%H5739>flocks<s%> of <S%H6629>sheep<s%>: <S%H5674>who<s%>, if he go through, both treads <S%H7429>down<s%>, and tears in <S%H2963>pieces<s%>, and none can <S%H5337>deliver<s%>.
Your <S%H3027>hand<s%> shall be lifted <S%H7311>up<s%> upon your <S%H6862>adversaries<s%>, and all your <S%H341>enemies<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%>.

And it shall come to pass in that <S%H3117>day<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, that I will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> your <S%H5483>horses<s%> out of the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H6>you<s%>, and I will destroy your <S%H4818>chariots<s%>:
And I will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H6145>cities<s%> of your <S%H776>land<s%>, and throw <S%H2040>down<s%> all your strong <S%H4013>holds<s%>:
And I will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H3785>witchcrafts<s%> out of your <S%H3027>hand<s%>; and you shall have no more <S%H6049>soothsayers<s%>:

Your engraved <S%H6456>images<s%> also will I cut <S%H3772>off<s%>, and your standing <S%H4676>images<s%> out of the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H7812>you<s%>; and you shall no more worship the <S%H4639>work<s%> of your <S%H3027>hands<s%>.
And I will pluck <S%H5428>up<s%> your <S%H842>groves<s%> out of the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H8045>you<s%>: so will I destroy your <S%H6145>cities<s%>.
And I will <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H5359>vengeance<s%> in <S%H639>anger<s%> and <S%H2534>fury<s%> upon the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, such as they have not <S%H8085>heard<s%>.
